00010 *       There are several function prototypes

00042 //1. Main Call Prototype:
00043 void SPRING_EMBEDDING_our(GRAPH<int,int>& G, list<node>& fixed_nodes,
00044                                       node_array<double>& xpos,
00045                                       node_array<double>& ypos,
00046                                       double xleft, double xright,
00047                                       double ybottom, double ytop,
00048                                       int iterations,node_array<int> &nodeIds);
00049 
00050 #define FREPULSE(d) ((k2 > d) ? kk/d : 0)
00051 
00052 static float log_2(int x)
00053 { float l = 0;
00054   while (x)
00055   { l++;
00056     x >>= 1;
00057    }
00058   return l/2;
00059 }
00060

00063                                       node_array<double>& ypos,
00064                                       double xleft, double xright,
00065                                       double ybottom, double ytop,
00066                                       int iterations,
00067                                                                           node_array<int> &nodeIds)
00068 { list<node> L;
00069   SPRING_EMBEDDING_our(G,L,xpos,ypos,xleft,xright,ybottom,ytop,iterations,nodeIds); 
00070 }

00072 //ii.  without border points and without fixed nodes
00073 void SPRING_EMBEDDING_(GRAPH<int,int>& G, node_array<double>& xpos, node_array<double>& ypos, int iterations,node_array<int> &nodeIds){
00074         GraphWin gw( G, 1000, 1000 );
00075         double xleft   = gw.get_xmin();
00076         double xright  = gw.get_xmax();
00077         double ybottom = gw.get_ymin();
00078         double ytop    = gw.get_ymax();
00079         list<node> L;
00080         SPRING_EMBEDDING_our(G,L,xpos,ypos,xleft,xright,ybottom,ytop,iterations,nodeIds); 
00081 }

00083 //iii. without border points and with fixed_nodes
00084 void SPRING_EMBEDDING_(GRAPH<int,int>& G, list<node>& fixed_nodes, node_array<double>& xpos, node_array<double>& ypos, int iterations, node_array<int> &nodeIds){
00085         GraphWin gw( G, 1000, 1000 );
00086         double xleft   = gw.get_xmin();
00087         double xright  = gw.get_xmax();
00088         double ybottom = gw.get_ymin();
00089         double ytop    = gw.get_ymax(); 
00090         SPRING_EMBEDDING_our(G,fixed_nodes,xpos,ypos,xleft,xright,ybottom,ytop,iterations, nodeIds); 
00091 }
00092 
00093 //1. Main Call 
00094 void SPRING_EMBEDDING_our(GRAPH<int,int>& G, list<node>& fixed_nodes,
00095                                       node_array<double>& xpos,
00096                                       node_array<double>& ypos,
00097                                       double xleft, double xright,
00098                                       double ybottom, double ytop,
00099                                       int iterations,
00100                                       node_array<int> &nodeIds)
00101 {
00102 
00103         int lower_bound=static_cast<int>(xleft);
00104         int upper_bound=static_cast<int>(xright);
00105         GraphWin gw( G, 500, 500 );
00106         random_source S2(lower_bound,upper_bound);
00107         int x1; 
00108         node u,v;
00109         forall_nodes(v,G) {
00110                         S2 >> x1;
00111                         xpos[v]=x1;
00112         }
00113         lower_bound=static_cast<int>(ybottom);
00114         upper_bound=static_cast<int>(ytop);
00115         S2.set_range(lower_bound,upper_bound);
00116         int y; 
00117         forall_nodes(v,G) {
00118                         S2 >> y;
00119                         ypos[v]=y;
00120         }
00121         if (xleft >= xright || ybottom >= ytop)
00122                 cout << "SPRING_EMBDDING: illegal bounds.";
00123 
00124         if (G.number_of_nodes() < 2) 
00125                 return;
00126 
00127         node_array<list_item> lit(G);
00128         node_array<bool> fixed(G,false);
00129 
00130 
00131         edge e;
00132 
00133         forall(v,fixed_nodes) 
00134                 fixed[v] = true;
00135 
00136         int c_f = 1;
00137 
00138         double width  = xright - xleft;
00139         double height = ytop - ybottom;
00140 
00141         double tx_null = width/50;
00142         double ty_null = height/50;
00143         double tx = tx_null;
00144         double ty = ty_null;
00145 
00146         double k = sqrt(width*height / G.number_of_nodes()) / 2;
00147         double k2 = 2*k;
00148         double kk = k*k;
00149 
00150         int ki = int(k);
00151 
00152         if (ki == 0) ki = 1;
00153 
00154         //build  matrix of node lists
00155 
00156         int xA = int(width / ki + 1);
00157         int yA = int(height / ki + 1);
00158 
00159         array2<list<node> > A(-1,xA,-1,yA);
00160 
00161         forall_nodes(v,G)
00162         { 
00163                 int i = int((xpos[v] - xleft)   / ki);
00164                 int j = int((ypos[v] - ybottom) / ki);
00165                 if (i >= xA || i < 0 || j >= yA || j < 0)
00166                         printf("spring: (%f %f) out of range (%f,%f,%f,%f)",xpos[v],ypos[v],xleft,ybottom,xright,ytop);
00167                 lit[v] = A(i,j).push(v);
00168         }
00169 
00170 
00171         while (c_f < iterations)
00172         {
00173                 node_array<double>  xdisp(G,0);
00174                 node_array<double>  ydisp(G,0);
00175 
00176                 // repulsive forces
00177 
00178                 forall_nodes(v,G)
00179                 { 
00180                         int i = int((xpos[v] - xleft)   / ki);
00181                         int j = int((ypos[v] - ybottom) / ki);
00182 
00183                         double xv = xpos[v];
00184                         double yv = ypos[v];
00185 
00186                         for(int m = -1; m <= 1; m++)
00187                                 for(int n = -1; n <= 1; n++)
00188                                         forall(u,A(i+m,j+n)){ 
00189                                            if(u == v) continue;
00190                                                          double xdist = xv - xpos[u];
00191                                                          double ydist = yv - ypos[u];
00192                                                          double dist = sqrt(xdist * xdist + ydist * ydist);
00193                                                          if (dist < 1e-3) dist = 1e-3;
00194                                                          xdisp[v] += FREPULSE(dist) * xdist / dist;
00195                                                          ydisp[v] += FREPULSE(dist) * ydist / dist;
00196                                         }
00197                         xdisp[v] *=  (double(rand_int(750,1250))/1000.0);
00198                         ydisp[v] *=  (double(rand_int(750,1250))/1000.0);
00199                  }
00200 
00201 
00202 
00203                 // attractive forces
00204 
00205                 forall_edges(e,G){ 
00206                         node u = G.source(e);
00207                         node v = G.target(e);
00208                         double xdist=xpos[v]-xpos[u];
00209                         double ydist=ypos[v]-ypos[u];
00210                         double dist=sqrt(xdist*xdist+ydist*ydist);
00211 
00212                         float f = (G.degree(u)+G.degree(v))/6.0;
00213 
00214                         dist /= f;
00215 
00216                         xdisp[v]-=xdist*dist/k;
00217                         ydisp[v]-=ydist*dist/k;
00218                         xdisp[u]+=xdist*dist/k;
00219                         ydisp[u]+=ydist*dist/k;
00220                 }
00221 
00222 
00223                 // preventions
00224 
00225                 forall_nodes(v,G){
00226                         if (fixed[v]) continue;
00227 
00228                         int i0 = int((xpos[v] - xleft)/ki);
00229                         int j0 = int((ypos[v] - ybottom)/ki);
00230 
00231                         double xd= xdisp[v];
00232                         double yd= ydisp[v];
00233                         double dist = sqrt(xd*xd+yd*yd);
00234 
00235                         if (dist < 1) 
00236                                 dist = 1;
00237 
00238                         xd = tx*xd/dist;
00239                         yd = ty*yd/dist;
00240 
00241                         double xp = xpos[v] + xd;
00242                         double yp = ypos[v] + yd;
00243 
00244                         int i = i0;
00245                         int j = j0;
00246 
00247                         if (xp > xleft && xp < xright){ 
00248                                 xpos[v] = xp;
00249                                 i = int((xp - xleft)/ki);
00250                         }
00251 
00252                         if (yp > ybottom && yp < ytop){ 
00253                                 ypos[v] = yp;
00254                                 j = int((yp - ybottom)/ki);
00255                         }
00256 
00257                         if (i != i0 || j != j0){ 
00258                                 if (lit[v] == nil) 
00259                                         error_handler(1,"delete nil item");
00260                                 A(i0,j0).del_item(lit[v]);
00261                                 lit[v] = A(i,j).push(v);
00262                         }
00263                 }
00264                 tx = tx_null / log_2(c_f);
00265                 ty = ty_null / log_2(c_f);
00266 
00267                 c_f++;
00268         }
00269 
00270 #ifdef SPRING_COLOR
00271         random_source S3(1,13);
00272         int random_value;
00273 
00274         forall_nodes( v, G ){
00275                 //S3 >> random_value;
00276                 color random( nodeIds[ v ] );
00277                 gw.set_color( v, random);
00278         }
00279 #endif SPRING_COLOR
00280 
00281 #ifdef SPRING_DRAW
00282         gw.set_position( xpos, ypos );
00283 
00284 
00285         gw.set_edge_thickness( 0.1, true );
00286         gw.set_node_height(5,true);
00287         gw.set_node_width(5,true);
00288         gw.set_layout();
00289         gw.set_animation_steps(3);
00290         gw.set_edge_label_type(leda::data_label , true);
00291         gw.display();
00292         gw.zoom_graph();
00293         gw.edit();
00294 
00295 #endif SPRING_DRAW
00296 }
